content: originally designed as a mystery knit for the mystery 220 more or less group for july 2023 materials ~60 grams of worsted weight yarn if you prefer to knit with fingering yarn you will need at least 20 grams your finished project will be smaller but will be the perfect size for holding a cake of fingering yarn self striping sock yarn works great ~size 6 needles use dpns flexi flips long circular for magic loop 9 or 10 inch circular 2 circulars - or whatever you usually use for knitting in the round for fingering weight use size 2 needles ~you will need 2 size 6 dpns for i-cord size 2 for fingering ~beginning of row marker removable stitch marker ~waste yarn or 4 safety pins at least 1 1/2 ~tapestry needle ~4 paper tags labeled 1 2 3 and 4 skills pin hole cast on optional i-cord kitchener stitch optional or three needle bind off stitches used knit purl kfb ssk k2tog m1r m1l this japanese knot style bag is very useful for knitting on the go while i don t recommend hiking and knitting at the same time because of the danger of falling this makes a great grab and go bag wear it over your wrist and you can knit while standing in line it s a great way to hold your yarn when knitting in the car on a boat on a train or subway in a plane on stadium bleachers in a beach chair sitting around a campfire in a movie theater at a doctor visit and anywhere else where you don t want your yarn to fall on the floor/ground and roll around pack it with a simple project and hang it on your door knob and you ll be ready to grab it as you go out the door you need never be without knitting again thanks to my friend knittingsal /people/knittingsal for testing the pattern and thanks to all of the group members of mystery 220 more or less for trusting me as you knit the mystery pattern
